Open your Debugger:

To open Chrome's debugger, press ⌘ + ⌥ + i

Using the Console:

In the debugger, go to the Console tab. From the Console tab, you can run your own JS. Try it by copy-paste-ing this snippet into the console.

image.src = 'http://i.giphy.com/4Z3DdOZRTcXPa.gif';

Once you've done that, hit Enter, and this image should change:

We will be using the console, and the Sources tab to learn

Viewing results in the console

From the Console, you can also see logs from things that are running on the page. For example, click this button:
